[id='copying-integrations-to-other-environments']
= Copying integrations to other environments

To run integrations across development, staging and
production environments, you can export and import integrations.
The environments can all be on a single OpenShift cluster,
or they can be spread out across multiple OpenShift clusters.
See the following topics:

* <<about-copying-integrations>>
* <<exporting-integrations>>
* <<importing-integrations>>

include::about_copying_integrations.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::exporting_integrations.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::importing_integrations.adoc[leveloffset=+1]
